description:
This Access course for beginners explains how to create and administer databases.

Learn the basics about data types, tables and queries, how to use validation rules, indexes and relationships and how to create forms for the entry and maintenance of data. Apart from that we explain how to use aggregate functions, calculated fields and filtering and sorting criteria for the evaluation and analysis of your data.

Use the videos and sample files to follow the course.

Course Duration: 13 - 22 hours
title: Learn Microsoft Access 2010 -The Ultimate Beginner Training-
instructors: LernFilme.com High quality video trainings for workplace learning. LernFilme.com
